data.message:
When questioned on Coca-Cola Life earlier this month, the brand’s marketing director for the UK and Ireland Bobby Brittain insisted the variant was never meant to be “more than a niche” and that Coca-Cola’s focus is on Coca-Cola Zero Sugar.

To find Coca-Cola Life is like a treasure hunt! Maybe because too healthy and not full of chemical sweeteners! 
I want to find the Coca-Cola Life in the shops exactly like the other Coca-Cola
